zh.title: 土耳其航空452号班机空难，154人遇难
美国与伊朗达成释放人质协议，危机结束
美国歌手比尔·威瑟斯宣布退出歌坛
弗雷迪·默丘里公开承认患有艾滋病
中国首台自主研制超导托卡马克建成
尼日利亚卡杜纳爆发骚乱，至少200人死亡
安吉丽娜·朱莉与布拉德·皮特公开恋情
孟加拉国塔兹雷恩制衣厂大火，117人丧生
哥伦比亚政府与反政府武装签署和平协议

en.title: Earthquake struck Turkey and killed thousands.
Achille Lauro hijackers convicted in Italy.
Freddie Mercury, Queen's lead singer, died.
China Southern Airlines Flight 3943 crashed, killing 141.
Ireland voted to remove the constitutional ban on divorce.
Angela Merkel became Germany's first female chancellor.
Fire at garment factory in Bangladesh killed 117 people.
Lewis Hamilton won the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix.
Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao resigned after pleading guilty to violating U.S. anti-money-laundering laws.
